snippet: Many sudden infant deaths, about one in eight, occur among infants who have been placed on sofas, researchers said on Monday.
abstract: Researcher report in journal Pediatrics that about one in eight cases of so-called crib death occur among infants who have been placed on sofas.
lead_paragraph: Many sudden infant deaths, about one in eight, occur among infants who have been placed on sofas, researchers said on Monday.

headline.main: Study Details the Risk to Infants Put on Sofas to Sleep
headline.print_headline: Study Details the Risk to Infants Put on Sofas to Sleep
